## About the Notes {.unnumbered}

This is a set of supplementary notes and examples for ECE 2714 in the Bradley Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at Virginia Tech.

See a mistake? [file an issue](https://github.com/clwyatt/notes-2714/issues). This helps improve the notes.

### Update History {.unnumbered}

This book is continually updated as new content becomes available and errata corrected.

* July 2025: Conversion of Chapters 2-5 complete.
* June 2025: Conversion of Chapter 1 complete.
* Feb 2025: Conversion from LaTeX pdf to accessible html started.
